name: Key Of The Dungeon
description:
Key of the Dungeon is 1 Bit Roguelike game,similiar to Adventure game for Atari 2600.

You need to pick up the skulls in order to defeat enemies,collect goblets to get +5 maximum health points,pick up the keys to unlock the doors and You need to go to the fountain of rejuvenation in order to heal Yourself.

MANUAL IS IN RAR FILE FOR BETTER UNDERSTANDING THE GAME,SO PLEASE READ IT BEFORE YOU START THE GAME!

HOPE YOU ENJOY IN THIS GAME AS MUCH AS I AM ENJOYED MAKING IT!
